thread.title: EU proposes online turnover tax for big tech firms

title: EU proposes online turnover tax for big tech firms
text:
EU proposes online turnover tax for big tech firms   01:49 
The European Commission has proposed rules to make digital companies pay their fair share of tax, with U.S. tech giants such as Google, Facebook and Amazon set to foot a large chunk of the bill. Matthew Larotonda reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The European Commission has proposed rules to make digital companies pay their fair share of tax, with U.S. tech giants such as Google, Facebook and Amazon set to foot a large chunk of the bill. Matthew Larotonda reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IJBZZO
